text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Hello – It is Sunday June 29th. Today I am officially 66 years old. I remember when I turned 55, I joked that I was the speed limit. Now… …I can say that I am cool and going to get my kicks on Route 66. :-) I bought myself a birthday gift – a present from me to me. It came on Thursday and I assembled it. Now I just need to add my personal style to it using paint. I will share what it is with you this week. Now onto the links I found for you this week. If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. Post navigation
html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

Hello – It is Sunday June 29th. Today I am officially 66 years old. I remember when I turned 55, I joked that I was the speed limit. Now…

…I can say that I am cool and going to get my kicks on Route 66. :-)

I bought myself a birthday gift – a present from me to me. It came on Thursday and I assembled it. Now I just need to add my personal style to it using paint. I will share what it is with you this week.

Now onto the links I found for you this week.

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.

Post navigation
